title: [Cascade of Tears, Promontory]
description: The view of the falls is breathtaking.  As the rushing river cascades over the cliff's edge, droplets of water mist the air and the moonlight refracts into a glittering curtain.  Yet for all its beauty, there is still a haunting sadness about this place.

The view of the falls is breathtaking.  As the rushing river cascades over the cliff's edge, droplets of water mist the air and the sunlight refracts into a brilliant rainbow.  Yet for all its beauty, there is still a haunting sadness about this place.
